    • Constructor Detail

      • MagicItem

        public MagicItem​(java.lang.String name,
                 char displayChar,
                 boolean consumable)
        Constructor, initialize the consumability of the item, add a ConsumeAction if it is consumable.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the MagicItem
        displayChar - the character to use to represent this item if it is on the ground
        consumable - true if the item can be consumed using ConsumeAction

    • Method Detail

      • isConsumable

        public void isConsumable()
        If the item is consumable, the player will be allowed to perform ConsumeAction when the player stands above the item.

        Getter for the Status of the MagicItem.

        status of the MagicItem

        Parameters:
        actor - the actor to give buff to
